name: Armilla Polar
description: This is a turn-based strategy mobile game with the setting about mecha, where players control mech pilots of humans on Earth to battle mechs from Mars. In each level, players need to reasonably command their own mech squad to defeat enemies based on different decision-making factors, such as the Mech Type system, Terrain system, Action Point system. Before entering a level, a well-thought-out combination of mecha components will also be an important factor in making combat easier. Once players win a level, they will have an opportunity to get new characters and new equipment, hence a diverse cast of mechs and various equipment can be used to make up of players' unique mech squad.
